Description:
PakWheels is looking for a passionate Video Content Creator Intern to join its dynamic team.  Responsibilities:Produce content for YouTube and other social media platforms.
Make promotional videos/ads for performance marketing.
Manipulate and edit footage in a way that is invisible to the audience.
Improve content by adding music, sound, footage or graphics.
Ensure all published content meets quality standards.
Collaborate with staff to brainstorm content topics.
Continuously discover and implement new production technologies and industry best practices to maximize efficiency.
Post Videos on social media Platforms with appropriate titles, descriptions, thumbnails and SEO to get maximum reach.Requirements:Bachelor's degree in Film & Television
Proficient at consumer-grade cameras, sound and other video production equipment. 
Proficient at Adobe Premiere Pro, After Effects and Photoshop.(or equivalent)
Demonstrable video production ability with a strong portfolio.
Interest in the Cars and Automobile industry is a must. 
Demonstrating excellent communication skills, Ability to communicate effectively, both verbally and in writing.
Ability to multi-task and handle a diverse workloadPakWheels.com was formed in 2003 and has become Pakistanâ€™s #1 Automotive Portal with 40+ Million users, more than 500,000+ registered car and motorcycle enthusiasts. Since its inception, PakWheels.com has helped millions of Pakistanis buy & sell automobiles, read automotive reviews and news, check automotive prices and find solutions to all of their automotive needs 
Today, PakWheels.com is the first name that comes to mind if anyone is looking for a solution to their automotive needs.Job Details
